summary: SPX Fractal Strategy Engine testing completed - backend forecast fix verified, frontend has mixed results

integration_issues.issue: Some components still showing unrealistic percentages (200%, -200%, 146%) despite backend API returning realistic values

passed_tests: SPX Strategy API /api/fractal/spx/strategy returns realistic forecast values
TailRisk values realistic (0.0% for all tested horizons)
Different presets produce different sizing (BALANCED vs AGGRESSIVE)
Error handling works for invalid horizon/preset parameters
SPX page loads and displays Market Phase Engine with realistic values
Backend API returns proper action/confidence/size values

success_percentage.frontend: 75% (main functionality works, some display issues remain)

action_item_for_main_agent: Main forecast fix is working correctly in backend API. However, some frontend components still display unrealistic percentages (200%, 146%) - investigate cached data or alternative data sources in UI components. The Strategy Summary may be working but browser automation had issues confirming specific values.
